mendel.dht.hash

Class HashRingEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • mendel.dht.hash.HashRingEntry

  • public class HashRingEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a node entry in a hash ring. This implementation is singly-linked; nodes maintain a reference to their successor only.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HashRingEntry neighbor
      Next neighboring node in the hash space
      java.math.BigInteger position
      Position in the hash space

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HashRingEntry(java.math.BigInteger position)
      Creates the first entry in a hash ring (neighbor is self).
      HashRingEntry(java.math.BigInteger position, HashRingEntry neighbor)
      Creates a hash ring entry with a provided position and neighbor.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • position

        public java.math.BigInteger position
        Position in the hash space

      • neighbor

        public HashRingEntry neighbor
        Next neighboring node in the hash space

    • Constructor Detail

      • HashRingEntry

        public HashRingEntry(java.math.BigInteger position)
        Creates the first entry in a hash ring (neighbor is self).
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the entry in the hash space

      • HashRingEntry

        public HashRingEntry(java.math.BigInteger position,
             HashRingEntry neighbor)
        Creates a hash ring entry with a provided position and neighbor.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the entry in the hash space
        neighbor - neighboring entry (based on position) in the hash space.
